price: 105. Ir jie klausia tavęs apie kalnus. Sakyk: „Mano Viešpats suardys juos ir išmėtys juos dulkėmis.“
arabic: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلۡجِبَالِ فَقُلۡ يَنسِفُهَا رَبِّي نَسۡفٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayasalūnaka ʿani al-jibāli faqul yansifuhā rabbī nasfan
